title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, list, pull models via npm.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama, supports streaming, JSON mode, embeddings.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package for Ollama; exposes chat, generate, embeddings as LangChain components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style); docker-compose one-liner, model manager, RAG uploads.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with syntax highlighting, chat sessions, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; shows retrieval augmented generation.

title: ollama-copilots
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as Copilot replacements; inline suggestions & chat panel.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat and generate code using local Ollama models; slash commands, selection prompts.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java SDK for Ollama; Maven Central artifact offers synchronous/asynchronous APIs and streaming.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js starter exposing REST endpoints over Ollama; includes Docker, rate-limit, OpenAPI spec.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async client for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, list, delete models.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that chats using Ollama models; slash commands, configurable system prompts.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST API for interacting with Ollama; includes admin panel, streaming responses.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Cross-platform desktop GUI for Ollama built with Qt6; model manager, chat window, markdown rendering.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot using Ollama for on-device LLM chats; supports groups, private chats, per-user model choice.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C#/.NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+, streaming, cancellation tokens, NuGet package.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that integrates Ollama models into channels; uses Bolt framework, ephemeral or threaded replies.
